peregrine.config
Class BaseConfig

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.config.BaseConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
Config
public class BaseConfig
extends java.lang.Object

Holds all the main properties for a Config including getters and setters.

Field Detail

DEFAULTS

public static StructMap DEFAULTS
The default params we have been started with. These are loaded from the .conf which we store in the .jar.
